ComicInfo.Summary:
The Man Who Could See Death!: Under the command of the medium Tilang Meers, a band of mediums conspires to prevent their exposure as frauds by brave newspaperman Chuck Simms.
The Madman of Maricombe Island!: In the prison colony on Maricombe Island the guard Letrec tries to break the prisoner Dubois. Dubois, however, withstands every way of torture - and Letrec's mind goes to waste.
The Sorrow of the Spirits!: Conrad Ganges has found a way to see the spirit world and to communicate with its inhabitants.
The Magic Spotlight!: Stage electrician Grew pretends to be the "Emotion Master" by casting magical spotlights. But he is only sabotaging the other acts.
Death and the Icy Sea!: The final voyage of the "Octavius" through arctic waters.
Amazing Power!: Investigator Peter Hurkos has psychic powers.
